document_data.name: Ondbiras
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste|58}}
document_data.mainbody: [[Ondbiras]] was an [[Imaskari]] [[Artificer (Imaskari)|artificer]] and the master of [[Yaravindar Ipurnos]].
document_data.History: Ondbiras was the master of [[Yaravindar Ipurnos]]. During the fighting between the manifestations of the [[Mulhorandi]] deities and the defenders of [[Inupras]], Ondbiras cast a spell that sent the pupil into a safe house in the [[Glittering Spires]]. Ondbiras was never seen again, and presumed dead by their student.
